Catalyst has its own custom **Medical** system that is unique to DayZ.
- Several different items with different healing amounts.
- Some items will spawn during Server Events.
- Some items are able to be purchased at Safezone Traders and other only in Black Market.

Item `healing rates` and `healing times` are shown on the slide at the bottom of this guide *__(the guide will show healing time, healing rate and blood regeneration)__.* They are also shown in the `item description in-game`.
